name: PreTransformer
description: PreTransformer, transforms a Tangle transfer value before going through the transfer process. Transforms a Tangle transfer before going through the transfer process.

functionDecorators.name: changeMinHoldAmount
functionDecorators.description: Changes the minHoldAmount, emits an event recording the change.

functionDecorators.name: preTransform
functionDecorators.description: Transforms a Tangle transfer value, ensures that a transfer cannot leave a holder's balance below the minHoldAmount.

parameterDecorators.name: spender
parameterDecorators.description: The address the Tangle is being transferred from.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of Tangle being transferred.
